backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented weather app features to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the weather application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color themes, and light/dark mode variables using OKLCH.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing app flow between empty state, location search, and weather display using React Query.
frontend/src/components/AdviceBanner.tsx: UI component that renders contextual weather advice with icons, styling, and variants based on conditions and severity.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with header, footer, and themed background.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing screen component showing a hero image, marketing copy, and a button to start location search.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution, credits, and external data source links with subtle styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component showing the app logo, name, and tagline with gradient branding.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Search interface allowing users to query locations, handle loading/errors, and select a place from geocoding results.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: React component that fetches and displays current weather for a selected place, handling loading, error, and success states. Renders location info, advice banner, and detailed weather metrics with UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, falling back to anonymous access. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentWeather.ts: React Query hook that fetches and caches current weather data for given coordinates with a 10-minute stale time and retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status flags, and persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceSearch.ts: React Query hook for searching places via geocoding, disabled by default and triggered manually, with short-term caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific React Query hooks are defined elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, light/dark theme CSS variables, and application-wide design tokens.
frontend/src/lib/weatherAdvice.ts: Utility that derives user-friendly weather advice based on current weather conditions such as rain, temperature, wind, and visibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/services/geocoding.ts: Service for searching geographic places using the OpenStreetMap Nominatim API and mapping results to internal Place objects.
frontend/src/services/weatherApi.ts: Service that fetches current weather data from the Open-Meteo API and normalizes it into the appâ€™s WeatherData format.
frontend/src/types/weather.ts: Type definitions for places, weather data, and derived weather advice used throughout the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugin setup with dark mode support.
project_state.json: Defines the overall state and scope of a location-based weather app, including core features for location lookup, weather fetching, contextual advice, theming, and static assets. Tracks existing features, pending feature requests, image requirements, and basic project metadata.
